TopicTitle: Do you have a copy of 0.24.2 lying around?

Articles.Content: Hi, i have always like 0.24 because i started with it. i had it for 2 years. But then my hard drive broke, and i lost this version. Can you please help me on getting this? Thanks in advance.

Since that is a version after they started selling the game as a product, trading it is illegal and I don't believe any of the vendors have versions that old still for legitimate download. 

Sorry.
